name: Lunar Lander (itch)
description:
1 REM This is a last minute entry for SpeccyJam 2017
   2 REM I originally tried to produce a roguelike but
   3 REM that failed miserably. I felt guilty for binning
   4 REM it the day before the end of the jam, so I
   5 REM decided to have another bash. I started this
   6 REM at 19:30bst (ish) on the 13th of June and I'm
   7 REM about to submit it at 23:15(ish)
   8 REM Sorry to anyone who "plays" this.
